text: 20.21: Mt 19.28 naŋga, Lu 22.30Kamatɨhi Jisas nuŋ nɨmavamba kitɨhumi, Na muhɨmɨrɨm pirɨkɨna, vami. Kamavahi navundi haŋambɨ Jisasɨŋ ambami, Na aru miku yɨvurahata, yandɨ ñɨŋi arɨkimbatɨŋ ambɨna, mu nɨma nandɨ kuma kandɨ sambavu mɨnzɨti, mu nɨma nandɨ kuma kakayɨ sambavu mɨnzɨm, vata pirɨkɨnɨ, vami.
